first_para: Charles Ashley Rupert Walker OBE (born 11 September 1967)is a Conservative Party politician in the United Kingdom, where he has been Member of Parliament for Broxbourne since 2005.

full.extract: Charles Ashley Rupert Walker OBE (born 11 September 1967)is a Conservative Party politician in the United Kingdom, where he has been Member of Parliament for Broxbourne since 2005.
full.title: Charles Walker (British politician)
